title: My Everything
description: "Jennifer Cruz just found her boyfriend of five years in bed with some blonde. Heartbroken and Angry, when her best friend Megan suggests they go to a club for a hook up, she says yes. It doesn’t take long for Jennifer to meet Phoenix, the man she will go home with. Phoenix is mysterious and dark, but Jennifer has to have him.  After what was supposed to be a one night stand, Jennifer finds out she is pregnant. To make matters worse she finds out her new boss at work is the mysterious and dark Phoenix.  Phoenix is an incubus, and doesn’t believe in love. When the woman who has invaded his every thought ever since they had sex is standing in his office he wants to scream…her face and smell have been forever burned into his head. Will Jennifer be enough for Phoenix and own his heart?"
author: Khelsey Jackson
